text: "I Want to Hold Your Hand" is a 1963 song by The Beatles and is a stand-alone single. It topped the single charts in Australia, Denmark, Germany, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Sweden, the United States and the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1963 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:The Supremes songs Category:Al Green songs Category:Sparks (band) songs
title: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
